Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vPACAdjCostCOGS' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vPACAdjCostCOGS] GO CREATE VIEW vPACAdjCostCOGS AS select cost.CompanyID, cost.FinPeriodID, i.ItemClassID, isnull(cost.TranCost,0) as FinPtdCostIssued, cost.BaseQty as FinPtdQtyIssued, hist.PACUnitCost as PACUnitCost, cost.InventoryID as InventoryID, (cost.BaseQty * hist.PACUnitCost) as PACIssueCost, (s.SiteID) as SiteID, (isnull(cost.TranCost,0) - (cost.BaseQty * hist.PACUnitCost)) as IssueAdjAmount, cost.ReasonCode, cost.RefNbr, cost.LineNbr, cost.SOOrderNbr from INTran cost inner join lumpacunitcosthistory hist on cost.FinPeriodID = hist.FinperiodID and cost.InventoryID = hist.InventoryID and cost.CompanyID = hist.CompanyID left join INSite s on cost.CompanyID = s.CompanyID and cost.SiteID = s.SiteID inner join InventoryItem i on cost.CompanyID = i.CompanyID and cost.InventoryID = i.InventoryID inner join INItemClass c on i.ItemClassID = c.ItemClassID and i.CompanyID = c.CompanyID where NULLIF(cost.SOOrderNbr, '') is not null and cost.COGSAcctID is not null and (cost.TranType = 'INV' OR cost.TranType = 'III') and (c.ItemClassCD != 'PACKMTRL ' OR NULLIF(cost.ReasonCode,'') is not null)
